alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Grainger; Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 4:57PM CDT until August 03 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Cocke, Grainger, Greene, Hamblen, Hawkins and Jefferson. * WHEN...Until 715 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2.5 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. A Flash Flood Warning also remains in effect for portions of Greene County more severely affected by heavy rainfall. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Morristown, Greeneville, Bean Station, Tusculum, White Pine, Parrottsville, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Mohawk, Caney Branch, Cedar Creek, Bybee, Lowland, Camp Creek and Alpha. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
